DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the incidence and predictive factors related to intestinal injury in patients undergoing heart valve replacement through a multicenter study in China.
DOC.brief_title: Incidence and Predictive Factors of Intestinal Injury in Patients Undergoing Heart Valve Replacements
DOC.detailed_description: Intestinal injury is one of main reasons for mobidity and mortality after heart valve replacement, but its incidence and potential risk factors remain unclear. A multicenter study in China is undertaken to investigate the incidence and predictive factors related to intestinal injury in patients undergoing heart valve replacement.
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing heart valve replacements under cardiopulmonary bypass Patients who die during or after operation
